thread.title: Woman in 'very critical' condition following Horner Park police shooting
thread.title_full: Woman in 'very critical' condition following Horner Park police shooting

title: Woman in 'very critical' condition following Horner Park police shooting
text:
Woman in 'very critical' condition following Horner Park police shooting Fire truck image Chicago Tribune illustration Chicago Tribune staff 
A woman was taken to a hospital in "very critical'' condition after she was shot by a Chicago police officer in the Horner Park neighborhood on the North Side Friday night. 
It happened in the 3900 block of North Western Avenue near a CVS pharmacy, police and other officials said. 
Chicago Fire department paramedics were called to the scene at 5:55 p.m. and took a woman about 40 to Advocate Illinois Masonic Medical Center in "very critical'' condition, said spokesman Curtis Hudson. 
No officers were injured.
